9  GrubSupervisor::GrubSupervisor(const std::string &name) :
10  Entity(name),
11  servers(),
12  total_u(0),
13  residual_capacity(0),
14  active_u(0) {}

16  GrubSupervisor::~GrubSupervisor() {}
17 
18  bool GrubSupervisor::addGrub(Grub *g)
19  {
20  if ( (total_u + g->getUtil()) > 1)
21  return false;
22  servers.push_back(g);
23  g->set_supervisor(this);
24  total_u += g->getUtil();
25  return true;
26  }
27 
28  void GrubSupervisor::set_active(Grub *g)
29  {
30  for (auto sp = servers.begin();
31  sp != servers.end();
32  ++sp)
33  (*sp)->updateBudget();
34 
35  active_u += g->getUtil();
36 
37  for (auto sp = servers.begin();
38  sp != servers.end();
39  ++sp)
40  (*sp)->startAccounting();
41  }
42 
43  void GrubSupervisor::set_idle(Grub *g)
44  {
45  for (auto sp = servers.begin();
46  sp != servers.end();
47  ++sp)
48  (*sp)->updateBudget();
49 
50  active_u -= g->getUtil();
51 
52  for (auto sp = servers.begin();
53  sp != servers.end();
54  ++sp)
55  (*sp)->startAccounting();
56  }

58  Tick GrubSupervisor::get_capacity()
59  {
60  Tick c = residual_capacity;
61  residual_capacity = 0;
62  return c;
63  }

65  void GrubSupervisor::newRun()
66  {
67  active_u = 0;
68  residual_capacity=0;
69  //cout << "NEW RUN" << endl;
70  }

73  {
74  }

78  Grub::Grub(Tick q, Tick p, const std::string &name, const std::string &sched) :
79  Server(name, sched),
80  Q(q),
81  P(p),
82  d(0),
83  util(double(Q)/double(P)),
84  recharging_time(0),
85  cap(),
86  vtime(),
87  supervisor(0)
88  {
89  register_handler(_idleEvt, this, &Grub::onIdle);
90  }
91 
92  Grub::~Grub() {}
93 
94  Tick Grub::getBudget() const { return Q; }
95  Tick Grub::getPeriod() const { return P; }
96  double Grub::getUtil() const { return util; }
97 
98  void Grub::updateBudget()
99  {
100  if (status == EXECUTING) {
101  vtime.stop();
102  cap.stop();
103  _bandExEvt.drop();
104  }
105  }
106 
107  void Grub::startAccounting()
108  {
109  if (status == EXECUTING) {
110  vtime.start(supervisor->getActiveUtilization()/getUtil());
111  cap.start(-supervisor->getActiveUtilization());
112  Tick delta = cap.get_intercept(0);
113  if (delta < 0) {
114  cout << "Task: " << dynamic_cast<Task *>(tasks[0])->getName() << endl;
115  cout << "Time: " << SIMUL.getTime() << endl;
116  cout << "Status: " << status << " -- intercept: " << delta << endl;
117  cout << "capacity: " << cap.get_value() << endl;
118  cout << "Supervisor utilization: " << supervisor->getActiveUtilization() << endl;
119  assert(0);
120  }
121  _bandExEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime() + cap.get_intercept(0));
122  }
123  }
124 
125  void Grub::onIdle(Event *evt)
126  {
127  assert(status == RELEASING);
128  releasing_idle();
129  }
130 
131  void Grub::idle_ready()
132  {
133  //cout << "IDLE-READY" << endl;
134  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
135  assert (status == IDLE);
136  status = READY;
137  cap.set_value(Q);
138  d = SIMUL.getTime() + P;
139  DBGPRINT_2("new deadline ",d);
140  setAbsDead(d);
141  vtime.set_value(SIMUL.getTime());
142  supervisor->set_active(this);
143  DBGPRINT_2("Going to READY at ", SIMUL.getTime());
144  //cout << "IDLE-READY end" << endl;
145  }
146 
147  void Grub::releasing_ready()
148  {
149  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
150  status = READY;
151  _idleEvt.drop();
152  DBGPRINT("FROM RELEASING TO READY");
153  }
154 
155  void Grub::ready_executing()
156  {
157  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
158  status = EXECUTING;
159  Tick extra = supervisor->get_capacity();
160  //cout << "Extra: " << extra << endl;
161  cap.set_value(cap.get_value() + extra);
162  startAccounting();
163  }
164 
165  void Grub::executing_ready()
166  {
167  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
168  updateBudget();
169  status = READY;
170  }
171 
172  void Grub::executing_releasing()
173  {
174  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
175  updateBudget();
176  status = RELEASING;
177  if (SIMUL.getTime() < Tick(vtime.get_value()))
178  _idleEvt.post(Tick(vtime.get_value()));
179  else _idleEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime());
180  }
181 
182  void Grub::releasing_idle()
183  {
184  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
185  if (SIMUL.getTime() > vtime.get_value()) {
186  Tick extra = Tick(getUtil() * double(SIMUL.getTime() - vtime.get_value()));
187  supervisor->set_capacity(extra);
188  }
189  status = IDLE;
190  supervisor->set_idle(this);
191  }
192 
193  void Grub::executing_recharging()
194  {
195  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
196  updateBudget();
197  status = RECHARGING;
198  if (getDeadline() < SIMUL.getTime())
199  _rechargingEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime());
200  else
201  _rechargingEvt.post(getDeadline());
202  }
203 
204  void Grub::recharging_ready()
205  {
206  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
207  cap.set_value(Q);
208  d = SIMUL.getTime() + P;
209  setAbsDead(d);
210  vtime.set_value(SIMUL.getTime());
211  status = READY;
212  }
213 
214  void Grub::recharging_idle()
215  {
216  // no way
217  //assert(0);
218  //cout << "RECHARGING - IDLE!" << endl;
219  releasing_idle();
220  }

223  {
224  // nothing to do now
